bomberman.core.logic
Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.Entity
      bomberman.core.logic.DynamicPhysicsEntity
          bomberman.core.logic.Bomb
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhysicsEntity, PhysicsEntity.HasContactListener
public class Bomb
extends DynamicPhysicsEntity
implements PhysicsEntity.HasContactListener

The Bomb class defines the logic structure of a bomb.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava

            Bomber bomber,
            Block c,
            int bombRange,
            boolean bombPass,
            boolean bombKick)
Instantiates a new bomb with some extra features.

Parameters:
logicWorld - the LogicWorld
bomber - the Bomber who placed the Bomb.
c - the Block in which the Bomb is placed.
bombRange - the explosion range
bombPass - Indicates if Bomber can pass over this Bomb
bombKick - Indicates if Bomber can kick off this Bomb
